1. Go to this page:
http://wiki.vcsa.uci.edu/bin/view/Twiki/TwikiDocumentat=
ion?cover=3Dprint
This is a legitimate Twiki documentation page.

2. Find t=
he word "Resource", you'll locate a table. Hit the "Resource" 
header on th=
at table. Note the URL for this link.

3. Once the page loads, hit the "Res=
ource" header link again. The same 
documentation loads but it is a differe=
nt URL. (Hence the trap).

Apparently our cralwer has stumbled on this for =
a good time. Since 
Twiki is a well known software I'm worried if there are=
 quite a few out 
there. Is there a effective way to filter out this trap?
=

Cheers,
